Dm_OP_0026_Text_004_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>But...there is one more shrine on
this island. There, you can get
another blessing.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_007_b_00:
Now, see all of the blue marks on
your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>?
Dm_OP_0026_Text_001_b_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I would suggest going there first and
seeing what you can find.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_005_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>If you add that to the other blessings
you received at shrines and offer them
all to the Goddess...
you might just find your way forward
after all.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_007_b:
<snd:Description_00>The Purah Pad lets you travel to certain
places instantly.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_001_b:
<snd:Think_01>I can sense Zelda's presence back near
those stairs you passed earlier.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_010_b:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>You remain in a weakened state. You're
not yet strong enough to open it.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_008_b:
You can travel instantly to any of them.
I'd suggest the one at the bottom of
your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_009_b:
Use the travel function to reach that area
quickly. You'll find the last of this island's
shrines around there somewhere.
Dm_OP_0026_Text_003_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>This door stands as a test of your own
overall vitality.
